snippet: Tony Parker scored 18 points to lead France past Latvia, 84-70, and Pau Gasol scored 27 points to help Spain advance with a 73-71 win over Greece.
abstract: France beats Latvia, 84-70, and Spain defeats Greece, 73-71, in quarterfinals of European basketball championship.
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker scored 18 points to lead France past Latvia, 84-70, and Pau Gasol scored 27 points to help Spain advance with a 73-71 win over Greece.

headline.main: France and Spain Reach European Basketball Semifinals
